description_0: An outdoor daylight view of a metal grate sun shade over another metal grate sun shade. Across the bottom two thirds of the frame is a horizontal grate. It has faded red metal bands with horizontal equal spaces between them. This grate is divided by four equal vertical bands. A large sign of the text,"EDUCATION" runs across the frame. It is one third of the way up from the bottom of the image. The text is in bold white, with serifs. The letters are mounted separately over the grate. Behind the grate with the text, across the top third of the frame, is a horizontal dull silver metal grate. One vertical band of metal runs down from the top right to behind the faded red grate. Across the bottom of the image, and under the sign, there is a round tree top shadow.
description_1: An outdoor, close up, worm's eye view of the upper edge of an office building covered in windows. There are 3 rows of windows in the building. The windows get smaller closer to the edge of the roof. A small vertical concrete post is placed on the left edge of the roof. A vertical concrete beam is attached to the top of the post. The bright sky above the building is filled with altocumulus clouds. The windows on the buildings are reflecting off-screen cumulus clouds. A partial reflection of an off-screen building is visible on the left side of the windows.
